backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access control, school profiles, user profiles, and per‑day daily reports with storage and authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing affected files, components, and requirements for daily report editing, per‑day data rules, and admin sync behavior.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON map summarizing key frontend files including dashboards, components, hooks, and behaviors related to daily report flow and admin views.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base layers and extensive light/dark theme CSS variables for UI colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and setting metadata and favicon.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, role routing, and admin view switching with loading and access‑denied handling.
frontend/src/components/admin/ActiveScho: Displays active schools with search, filtering, loading/error states, and an edit dialog trigger.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSumma: Shows summary cards for active school count and daily report submissions with loading placeholders.
frontend/src/components/admin/AnalyticsS: Renders trend and completion analytics charts using daily reports, with loading skeletons and computed metrics.
frontend/src/components/admin/DailyProgr: Shows completion badges for report categories based on submitted scores and optional photo data.
frontend/src/components/admin/EditSchool: Modal form for editing a school’s profile and saving updates via mutation with validation and toasts.
frontend/src/components/admin/KepsekProf: Form for registering a principal’s school profile, validating inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/Monitoring: Displays daily monitoring rows, sorts them by report status and score, and allows viewing detailed reports via a modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/ReportDeta: Shows detailed information for a daily report, including photos, timestamps, category scores, and notes in a dialog.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header component with branding, logout logic that clears queries, and optional child controls.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/Attendanc: Handles image upload for attendance photos with validation, previews, and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/DailyRepo: Form for creating or editing a daily report, managing photo, time fields, checkboxes, notes, and saving to backend.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/ProfileSe: Dialog for initial school profile setup, collecting school name, region, and principal name before saving.
frontend/src/components/kepsek/TodaySubm: Displays a submitted daily report summary including photo, times, notes, and score details with an edit option.
frontend/src/components/StatusPills.tsx: Reusable badge components for displaying scores, submission state, and category score indicators with color coding.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and auth client configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps backend calls in React Query hooks for roles, schools, reports, and related mutations, scoped to the authenticated actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes with a blue‑green palette.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility to merge class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/localization/dashboardId.ts: Centralized Indonesian UI text for admin and principal dashboards, including labels, messages, and section titles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDeniedPage.tsx: Renders an access denied screen with principal ID display, copy action, logout, and retry role-check functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Renders the admin dashboard with date selection, report download, summary cards, analytics, active schools, and monitoring table.
frontend/src/pages/AdminKepsekManagement: Provides UI for managing and registering school principal profiles, including a form toggle and instructions.
frontend/src/pages/KepsekDashboardPage.t: Displays the Kepsek dashboard with school profile loading, daily report viewing/editing, date selection, and missing-profile handling.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Shows the login screen with Internet Identity authentication and basic branding.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utility functions for unwrapping Candid optional values and handling optional ExternalBlob fields.
frontend/src/utils/dayKey.ts: Provides timezone-safe utilities for generating day keys and parsing/formatting date input values.
frontend/src/utils/reportDownload.ts: Generates and downloads admin monitoring data as a CSV file with formatting helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear stored or hash-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, including daily report requirements, known bugs, and feature requests for the School Daily Reports system.
